attributes.additional_details:
I don't think people (especially celebrites) should be allowed to marry anyone they have met on a TV show (such as I'm A Celebrity or Big Brother).
Not only do I find this absurd but it also affects relationships outside the show.
Think how Camille Aznar must have felt when she saw Preston all over Chantelle or how Sarah Matravers must have felt when she saw Mark Bannerman all over Cerys.
Preston and Mark have become love-rats as a reult of there being no law. Also a psychologist said (in Daily Star) that these sort of relationships are like holiday flings.
Chantelle was hurt twice by Preston and she is very fragile.
So I want these sort of marriages disallowed. They can flirt on the show but then it is over.
